name: CONSTRUCTION & DESIGN, INC. v. KORESKO & ASSOCIATES, P.C. and Jocelyn Properties, Inc. and First State Properties No. 16, LLC; Petition of Koresko & Associates, P.C., Jocelyn Properties, Inc. and BNB Properties Construction & Design, Inc. v. BNB Properties, LLC and Jocelyn Properties, Inc. Petition of Koresko & Associates, P.C., Jocelyn Properties, Inc. and BNB Properties
name_abbreviation: Construction & Design, Inc. v. Koresko & Associates, P.C.

parties: CONSTRUCTION & DESIGN, INC. v. KORESKO & ASSOCIATES, P.C. and Jocelyn Properties, Inc. and First State Properties No. 16, LLC. Petition of Koresko & Associates, P.C., Jocelyn Properties, Inc. and BNB Properties Construction & Design, Inc. BNB Properties, LLC and Jocelyn Properties, Inc. Petition of Koresko & Associates, P.C., Jocelyn Properties, Inc. and BNB Properties.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of December, 2012, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and this matter is REMANDED for reconsideration in light of Neuman Development Group of Pottstoum, LLC v. Genuardi’s Family Markets, Inc., 52 A.3d 1233 (Pa.2012).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
57 A.3d 641
CONSTRUCTION & DESIGN, INC. v. KORESKO & ASSOCIATES, P.C. and Jocelyn Properties, Inc. and First State Properties No. 16, LLC. Petition of Koresko & Associates, P.C., Jocelyn Properties, Inc. and BNB Properties Construction & Design, Inc. BNB Properties, LLC and Jocelyn Properties, Inc. Petition of Koresko & Associates, P.C., Jocelyn Properties, Inc. and BNB Properties.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 13, 2012.
